org.cyclops.cyclopscore.config

Class ConfigHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.HashSet<E>
          • java.util.LinkedHashSet<ExtendedConfig<?>>
            • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.config.ConfigHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<ExtendedConfig<?>>, java.util.Collection<ExtendedConfig<?>>, java.util.Set<ExtendedConfig<?>>

    public class ConfigHandler
extends java.util.LinkedHashSet<ExtendedConfig<?>>
    Create config file and register items and blocks from the given ExtendedConfigs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getConfigFromItem

        @Nullable
public static ExtendedConfig<?> getConfigFromItem(net.minecraft.item.Item item)
        Get the config from a given item. It will internally also try to get the blockState from the item if it exists to get the config from.
        Parameters:
        item - The item, possibly IConfigurable.
        Returns:
        The config or null.

      • registerToRegistry

        public <V extends net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<V>> void registerToRegistry(net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistry<V> registry,
                                                                                                net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<V> entry,
                                                                                                @Nullable
                                                                                                java.util.concurrent.Callable<?> callback)
        Register the given entry to the given registry. This method will safely wait until the correct registry event for registering the entry.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The entry type.
        Parameters:
        registry - The registry.
        entry - The entry.
        callback - A callback that will be called when the entry is registered.
